arabicText: قَـٰتِلُوهُمْ يُعَذِّبْهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِأَيْدِيكُمْ وَيُخْزِهِمْ وَيَنصُرْكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَيَشْفِ صُدُورَ قَوْمٍۢ مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	fight	them	- Allah will	punish	them	at	
your	 hands,	 and	 He	 will	 disgrace	 them	
and	 assist	 you	 over	 them,	 and	 He	 will	
soothe	the	hearts	of	the	believers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 un	 se	 lado	 Allah	 unheiñ	 ‘aƶāb	 dega	
tumhāre	 hāthoñ	 aur	 unheiñ	 ruswa	
karega	aur	tumheiñ		un	par	madad	dega	
aur	Imān	wāloñ	ka	ji	thanda	karega.

arabicText: وَيُذْهِبْ غَيْظَ قُلُوبِهِمْ ۗ وَيَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	He	will	remove	the	anxiety	of	their	
hearts;	 and	 Allah may	 accept	 the	
repentance of	 whomever	 He	 wills;	 and	
Allah is	All	Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 unke	 diloñ	 ki	 ghutan	 (Jalan	 wa	
ghussa)	 door	 farmayega	 aur	 Allah	 jiski	
chāhe	 tauba	 qabool	 farmaye	 aur	 Allah	
Ilm-o-Hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تُتْرَكُوا۟ وَلَمَّا يَعْلَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا رَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَلِيجَةًۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Are	 you	 under	 the	 illusion	 that	 you	
would	 be	 left	 just	 like	 this,	 whereas	
Allah has	 not	 yet	made	 known	 those	 of	
you	who	will	fight	and	not	confide	their	
secrets	 with	 anyone	 except	 Allah and	
His	Noble	Messenger	 and	 the	Muslims?	
And	Allah is	Well	Aware	of	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	is	gumān	meiñ	 ho	 ke	 yuñ	 hi	 chhod	
diye	jāoge	aur	abhi	Allah	ne	pehchān	na	
karāyi	 unki	 jo	 tum	 meiñ	 se	 Jihād	
kareñge	 aur	 Allah	 aur	 uske	 Rasool	 aur	
Musalmanoñ ke	 siwa	 kisi	 ko	 apna	
mehram-e-rāz	 na	 banayeñ	 ge	 aur	 Allah	
tumhāre	kāmoñ	se	khabar-dār	hai.

arabicText: مَا كَانَ لِلْمُشْرِكِينَ أَن يَعْمُرُوا۟ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ شَـٰهِدِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِم بِٱلْكُفْرِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ وَفِى ٱلنَّارِ هُمْ خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	 does	 not	 befit	 the	 polytheists	 to	
assemble	 in	 Allah’s	 masjids	 after	
themselves	 bearing	 witness	 of	 their	
disbelief;	 in	 fact	 all	 their	 deeds	 are	
wasted;	and	they	will	remain	in	the	 fire	
forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mushrikoñ	 ko	 nahi	 pahuñchta	 ke	 Allah	
ki	 masjideiñ	 āabād	 kareiñ khud	 apne	
kufr	 ki	 gawahi	 dekar	 unka	 to	 sab	 kiya	
dharā	 akārat	 (Zāye)	 hai	 aur	 woh	
hamesha	āag	meiñ	raheñge.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا يَعْمُرُ مَسَـٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ مَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَأَقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَى ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَلَمْ يَخْشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۖ فَعَسَىٰٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَن يَكُونُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Only	 those	 enliven	 the	masjids	 of	Allah
who	 believe	 in	 Allah and	 the	 Last	 Day	
and	 establish	 prayer	 and	 pay	 the	
obligatory	charity	and	 fear	none	except	
Allah - so	 it	 is	 likely	 that	 they	 will	 be	
among	the	people	of	guidance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ki	Masjideiñ wohi	āabād	karte	haiñ	
jo	 Allah	 aur	Qiyamat par	 Imān	 lāte	 aur	
Namāz qāim	 karte	 haiñ	 aur Zakāt dete	
haiñ	aur	Allah	ke	siwa	kisi	se	nahi	darte	to	qareeb	hai	ke	yeh	log	Hidayat	wāloñ	meiñ	hoñ	.

arabicText: ۞ أَجَعَلْتُمْ سِقَايَةَ ٱلْحَآجِّ وَعِمَارَةَ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ كَمَنْ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَجَـٰهَدَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوُۥنَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	have	 they	 taken	 the	quenching	of	 the	pilgrims’	 thirst	and	servicing	of	 the	Sacred	Masjid as	
equal	(in	merit)	to	him	who	accepted	faith	in	Allah and	the	Last	Day,	and	fought	in	Allah’s	way?	
They	are	not	equal	before	Allah;	and	Allah does	not	guide	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	tum	ne	Hājiyoñ ki	sabeel	aur	Masjid-e-Harām ki	khidmat	uske	barabar	thehra	li	jo	Allah	
aur	Qiyamat	par	Imān	lāya	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	Jihād	kiya	woh	Allah	ke	nazdeek	barabar	nahi	
aur	Allah	zālimoñ	ko	rāh	nahi	deta.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	accepted	faith,	and	left	their	homes	and	fought	with	their	wealth	and	their	lives	in	
Allah’s	way	have	a	greater	rank	before	Allah;	and	it	is	they	who	have	succeeded.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	Hijrat	ki	aur	apne	māl-o-jān	se	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	lade	Allah	ke	yahāñ	unka	
darja	bada	hai aur	wohi	murād	ko	pahuñche.

arabicText: يُبَشِّرُهُمْ رَبُّهُم بِرَحْمَةٍۢ مِّنْهُ وَرِضْوَٰنٍۢ وَجَنَّـٰتٍۢ لَّهُمْ فِيهَا نَعِيمٌۭ مُّقِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
Their	Lord	gives	them	the	glad	tidings	of	
His	 mercy	 and	 His	 pleasure,	 and	 the	
Gardens	 in	 which	 are	 everlasting	
favours	for	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unka	Rab	unheiñ	khushi	sunata	hai	apni	
raḥmat	aur	apni	riza	ki	aur	un	bāghoñ	ki	
jin	meiñ	unheiñ	dāimi	ne'mat	hai.

arabicText: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
They	 will	 abide	in	it	 for	 ever	 and	 ever;	
indeed	with	Allah is	the	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hamesha	 hamesha	 un	 meiñ	 raheñ	 ge	
beshak	Allah	ke	pās	bada	sawāb	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ ءَابَآءَكُمْ وَإِخْوَٰنَكُمْ أَوْلِيَآءَ إِنِ ٱسْتَحَبُّوا۟ ٱلْكُفْرَ عَلَى ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُم مِّنكُمْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Do	 not	 consider	
your	 fathers	and	 your	 brothers	as	 your	
friends	if	they	prefer	disbelief	over	faith;	
and	whoever	among	you	befriends	them	
- then	it	is	he	who	is	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	 Apne	 bāp	 aur	 apne	
bhaiyoñ	 ko	 dost	 na	 samjho	 agar	 woh	
Imān	 par	 kufr	 pasand	 kareiñ	 	 aur	 tum	
meiñ	 jo	 koi	 un	 se	 dosti	 karega	 to	 wohi	
zālim	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ إِن كَانَ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ وَأَبْنَآؤُكُمْ وَإِخْوَٰنُكُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُكُمْ وَعَشِيرَتُكُمْ وَأَمْوَٰلٌ ٱقْتَرَفْتُمُوهَا وَتِجَـٰرَةٌۭ تَخْشَوْنَ كَسَادَهَا وَمَسَـٰكِنُ تَرْضَوْنَهَآ أَحَبَّ إِلَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَجِهَادٍۢ فِى سَبِيلِهِۦ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِىَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَمْرِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“If	your	fathers,	and	your	sons,	and	
your	brothers,	and	your	wives,	and	your	
tribe,	and	your	acquired wealth,	and	the	
trade	 in	 which	 you	 fear	 a	 loss,	 and	 the	
houses	 of	 your	 liking	 - if	 all	 these	 are	
dearer	 to	 you	 than	Allah and	His	Noble	
Messenger	and	fighting	in	His	way,	then	
wait	 until	 Allah brings	 about	 His	
command;	and	Allah does	not	guide	the	
sinful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmāo	 agar	 tumhāre	 bāp	 aur	
tumhāre	 bete	 aur	 tumhāre	 bhai	 aur	
tumhāri	aurteiñ	aur	tumhāra	kumba	aur	
tumhāri	 kamāyi	 ke	 māl	 aur	 woh	 sauda	
jiske	 nuqsān	 ka	 tumheiñ	 	 dar	 hai	 aur	
tumhāre	pasand	ke	makān	yeh	cheezeiñ	
Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	aur	uski	rāh	meiñ	
ladne	se	ziyada	pyāri	hoñ		to	rāsta	dekho	(Intezār	karo)	yahāñ	tak	ke	Allah	apna	ḥukm		lāye	aur	
Allah	fāsiqoñ	ko	rāh	nahi	deta.

arabicText: لَقَدْ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى مَوَاطِنَ كَثِيرَةٍۢ ۙ وَيَوْمَ حُنَيْنٍ ۙ إِذْ أَعْجَبَتْكُمْ كَثْرَتُكُمْ فَلَمْ تُغْنِ عَنكُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَضَاقَتْ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتْ ثُمَّ وَلَّيْتُم مُّدْبِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 Allah helped	 you	 on	 many	
occasions	- and	 on	 the	 day	 of	Huneyn	-
when	you	prided	in	your	multitude,	so	it	
did	not	benefit	you	at	all,	and	 the	earth	
despite	being	vast	became	restricted	for	you	- then	you	turned	back	and	returned.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		Allah	ne	bahut	jagah	tumhāri	madad	ki	aur	hunain	ke	din	jab	tum	apni	kasrat	par	itra	
gaye	they	to	woh	tumhāre	kuchh	kām	na	āayi	aur	zameen	itni	wasee'	hokar	tum	par	tang	hogayi	
phir	tum	peeth	dekar	phir	gaye.

arabicText: ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَنزَلَ جُنُودًۭا لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا وَعَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	Allah sent	 down	 His	 calm	 upon	 His	 Noble	 Messenger	 and	 upon	 the	 Muslims,	 and	 sent	
down	 armies	 you	 did	 not	 see,	 and	 punished	 the	 disbelievers;	 and	 such	 is	 the	 reward	 of	 the	
deniers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	Allah	ne	apni	taskeen	utāri	apne	Rasool	par	aur	Musalmanoñ		par	aur	woh	lashkar	utārey	
jo	tum	ne	na	dekhe	aur	kāfiroñ	ko	‘aƶāb	diya	aur	munkiroñ	ki	yehi	saza	hai.

arabicText: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 afterwards	 Allah will	 give	
repentance to	 whomever	 He	 wills;	 and	
Allah is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 iske	 bād	 Allah	 jise	 chāhe	 ga	 tauba	
dega	 aur	 Allah	 bakhsh	 ne	 wāla	
maherbān	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ نَجَسٌۭ فَلَا يَقْرَبُوا۟ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ بَعْدَ عَامِهِمْ هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ عَيْلَةًۭ فَسَوْفَ يُغْنِيكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦٓ إِن شَآءَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 The	 polytheists	
are	utterly	 filthy	*;	so	after	 this	year	do	
not	 let	 them	 come	 near	 the	 Sacred	
Masjid;	 and	if	 you	 fear	 poverty	 **,	 then	
Allah will	 soon	 make	 you	 wealthy	 with	
His	grace,	if	He	wills;	indeed	Allah is	All	
Knowing,	Wise.	
(* Filthy in body and soul. **Due to 
loss of trade.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	 Mushrik	 nire	 (bilkul)	
na-pāk	 haiñ	 to	 is	 baras	 ke	 b’ad	 woh	
Masjid-e-Harām ke	 pās	 na	 āane	 	 pāyeñ	
aur	 agar	 tumheiñ mohtāji	 ka	 dar	 hai	 to	
‘an-qareeb	 Allah	 tumheiñ daulat	 mand	
kar	dega	apne	fazl	se	agar	chāhe	be-shak		
Allah	Ilm-o-Hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: قَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَلَا يُحَرِّمُونَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَلَا يَدِينُونَ دِينَ ٱلْحَقِّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ حَتَّىٰ يُعْطُوا۟ ٱلْجِزْيَةَ عَن يَدٍۢ وَهُمْ صَـٰغِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Fight	 against	 the	 People	 given	 the	
Book(s)	who	do	not	accept	faith	in	Allah
and	 the	 Last	Day,	and	who	do	not	 treat	
as	 forbidden	what	is	 forbidden	by	Allah
and	 by	 His	 Noble	 Messenger,	 and	 who	
do	not	follow	the	true	religion,	until	they	
pay	the	tariff	with	their	own	hands	with	
humiliation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Lardo	un	se	jo	 Imān	nahi	lāte	Allah	par	
aur	 qiyamat	 par	 aur	 harām	 nahi	mānte	
us	cheez	ko	jis	ko	harām	kiya	Allah	aur	
uske	 Rasool	 ne	 aur	 sachche	 deen	 ke	
tābe'	 nahi	 hote	 yāni	 woh	 jo	 kitāb	 diye	
gaye	jab	tak	apne	hāth	se	jizya	na	deñ	zaleel	hokar

arabicText: وَقَالَتِ ٱلْيَهُودُ عُزَيْرٌ ٱبْنُ ٱللَّهِ وَقَالَتِ ٱلنَّصَـٰرَى ٱلْمَسِيحُ ٱبْنُ ٱللَّهِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ قَوْلُهُم بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ ۖ يُضَـٰهِـُٔونَ قَوْلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ قَـٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ أَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 Jews	 said,	 “Uzair	 is	 the	 son	 of	
Allah”,	 and	 the	 Christians	 said	 “The	
Messiah	is	the	son	of	Allah”;	they	utter	this	from	their	own	mouths;	they	speak	like	the	former	
disbelievers;	may	Allah kill	them;	where	are	they	reverting!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yahudi	bole	Uzair	Allah	ka	beta	hai	aur	Nasrāni	bole	Maseeh	Allah	ka	beta	hai	yehi	bāteiñ	
woh	moñh	se	bakte	haiñ	agle	kāfiroñ	ki	si	bāt	banāte	haiñ	Allah	unheiñ	māre	kahāañ	auñdhe	
jāte	haiñ.

arabicText: ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ أَحْبَارَهُمْ وَرُهْبَـٰنَهُمْ أَرْبَابًۭا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَسِيحَ ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَـٰهًۭا وَٰحِدًۭا ۖ لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	have	taken	their	rabbis	and	their	monks	as	Gods	besides	Allah and	(also)	Messiah	the	son	
of	Maryam;	 and	 they	 were	 not	 commanded	 except	 to	 worship	 only	 One	 God	- Allah;	 none	is	
worthy	of	worship	except	Him;	Purity	is	to	Him	from	all	that	they	ascribe	as	partners	(to	Him).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unhoñ	ne	apne	pādriyoñ	aur	jogyoñ	ko	Allah	ke	siwa	khuda	banā	liya	aur	Maseeh	ibn-e-Maryam
ko	aur	unheiñ	ḥukm		na	 tha	magar	yeh	ke	ek	Allah	ko	poojeiñ	uske	siwa	kisi	ki	bandagi	nahi	
usey	pāki	hai	unke	shirk	se.

arabicText: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُطْفِـُٔوا۟ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَيَأْبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّآ أَن يُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	wish	 to	extinguish	 the	light	of	Allah
with	their	mouths,	but	Allah will	not	agree	
except	 that	He	will	perfect	His	light,	even	
if	the	disbelievers	get	annoyed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Chāhte	haiñ	ke	Allah	ka	Noor	apne	muñh	
se	bujha	deñ	aur	Allah	na	māne	ga	magar	
apne	Noor	ka	poora	karna	pade	(agarche)		
bura	māneiñ	kāfir

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	 is	 He	 Who	 has	 sent	 His	 Noble	
Messenger	 with	 guidance	 and	 the	 true	
religion,	in	order	to	prevail	over	all	other	
religions	 - even	 if	 the	 polytheists	 get	
annoyed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	 hai	 jis	 ne	 apna	 Rasool	Hidāyat	 aur	
Sachche	 deen	 ke	 sāth	 bheja	 ke	 usey	 sab	
deenoñ	par	ghalib	kare	pade bura	māneiñ	
mushrik.

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْبَارِ وَٱلرُّهْبَانِ لَيَأْكُلُونَ أَمْوَٰلَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَكْنِزُونَ ٱلذَّهَبَ وَٱلْفِضَّةَ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَهَا فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Indeed	many	of	the	
(Jewish)	rabbis	and	the	(Christian)	monks	
unjustly	 devour	 people's	 wealth	 and	
prevent	 from	Allah’s	way;	and	 those	who	
hoard	up	gold	and	silver	and	do	not	spend	
it	 in	 Allah’s	 way	- so	 them	 give	 the	 glad	
tidings	of	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	wālo!	Be-shak		bahut	pādri	aur	
jogi	logoñ	ka	māl	na-haq	kha	jāte	haiñ	aur	
Allah	ki	rāh	se	rokte	haiñ	aur	woh	ke	jod	
kar	rakhte	haiñ	sona	aur	chāñdi	aur	usey	
Allah	 ki	 rāh	 meiñ	 kharch	 nahi	 karte	
unheiñ	 khush	 khabri	 sunāo	 dard-nāk	
‘aƶāb	ki.

arabicText: يَوْمَ يُحْمَىٰ عَلَيْهَا فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ فَتُكْوَىٰ بِهَا جِبَاهُهُمْ وَجُنُوبُهُمْ وَظُهُورُهُمْ ۖ هَـٰذَا مَا كَنَزْتُمْ لِأَنفُسِكُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَكْنِزُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	day	when	it	will	be	heated	in	the	fire	
of	hell,	and	their	foreheads	and	their	sides	
and	 their	 backs	 will	 be	 branded	 with	
them;	 “Here	 is	 what	 you	 hoarded	 for	
yourselves;	 so	 now	 taste	 the	 joy	 of	 your	
hoarding!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jis	din	woh	tapāya	jāyega	jahannam	ki	āag	
meiñ	phir	us	se	dāgheñ	ge	unki	peshāniyañ	aur	karwateiñ	aur	peetheiñ; yeh	hai	woh	jo	tum	ne	
apne	liye	jod	kar	rakha	tha; ab	chakho	maza	is	jodne	ka.

arabicText: إِنَّ عِدَّةَ ٱلشُّهُورِ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱثْنَا عَشَرَ شَهْرًۭا فِى كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ يَوْمَ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ مِنْهَآ أَرْبَعَةٌ حُرُمٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلدِّينُ ٱلْقَيِّمُ ۚ فَلَا تَظْلِمُوا۟ فِيهِنَّ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۚ وَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ كَآفَّةًۭ كَمَا يُقَـٰتِلُونَكُمْ كَآفَّةًۭ ۚ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 the	 number	 of	 months	 before	
Allah is	 twelve	 - in	 the	 Book	 of	 Allah -
since	the	day	He	created	the	heavens	and	the	earth,	of	which	four	are	sacred;	this	the	straight	
religion;	 so	 do	 not	 wrong	 yourselves	 in	 those	 months;	 and	 constantly	 fight	 against	 the	
polytheists	as	they	constantly	fight	against	you;	and	know	well	that	Allah is	with	the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		mahinoñ	ki	ginti	Allah	ke	nazdeek	bārah	mahine	haiñ	Allah	ki	kitāb	meiñ	jab	se	us	ne	
āasmān-o	zameen	banaye	un	meiñ	se	chār	hurmat	wāle	haiñ	yeh	seedha	deen	hai	to	in	mahinoñ	
meiñ	apni	jān	par	zulm	na	karo	aur	mushrikoñ	se	har	waqt	lado	jaisa	woh	tum	se	har	waqt	ladte	
haiñ	aur	jān	lo	ke	Allah	parhez-gāroñ	ke	sāth	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّسِىٓءُ زِيَادَةٌۭ فِى ٱلْكُفْرِ ۖ يُضَلُّ بِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُحِلُّونَهُۥ عَامًۭا وَيُحَرِّمُونَهُۥ عَامًۭا لِّيُوَاطِـُٔوا۟ عِدَّةَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ فَيُحِلُّوا۟ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ زُيِّنَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ أَعْمَـٰلِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Their	 postponing	 of	 the	 months	 is	
nothing	but	furtherance	in	disbelief	- the	
disbelievers	 are	 misled	 by	 it	 - they	
decree	it	lawful	in	one	year	and	regard	it	
forbidden	 in	 another	 year,	 in	 order	 to	
equate	 to	 the	 number	 of	 the	 months	
which	 Allah has	 made	 sacred,	 and	 to	
make	 lawful	 what	 Allah has	 forbidden;	
their	evil	deeds	seem	good	in	their	sight;	
and	 Allah does	 not	 guide	 the	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unka	 mahine	 peechhe	 hatāna	 nahi	
magar	aur	 kufr	meiñ	 badhna	is	 se	 kāfir	
behkāye	 jāte	 haiñ	 ek	 baras	 usey	 halāl	
thehrāte	 haiñ	 aur	 doosre	 baras	 usey	
harām	mānte	haiñ	ke	us	ginti	ke	barabar	
ho	jāyeñ	jo	Allah	ne	harām	 farmayi	aur	
Allah	 ke	 harām	 kiye	 huwe	 halāl	 karleiñ	
unke	bure	kām	unki	ānkhoñ	meiñ	bhale	
lagte	haiñ	aur	Allah	kāfiroñ	ko	rāh	nahi	
deta.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَا لَكُمْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمُ ٱنفِرُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱثَّاقَلْتُمْ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ أَرَضِيتُم بِٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مِنَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ فَمَا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 What	 is	 the	
matter	with	 you,	 that	when	it	is	said	 to	
you,	 “Migrate	 in	 Allah's	 cause”,	 you	 sit	
on	the	ground	with	heaviness?	Have	you	
preferred	 this	 worldly	 life	 over	 the	
Hereafter?	And	 the	wealth	 of	 the	life	 of	
this	 world,	 in	 comparison	 with	 the	
Hereafter,	is	but	only	a	little.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo!	Tumheiñ		kya	huwa	jab	
tum	 se	 kahā	 jāye	 ke	 rāh-e-khuda	 meiñ	
kooch	karo	to	bojh	ke	māre	zameen	par	
baith	 jāte	 ho	 kya	 tum	 ne	 duniya	 ki	
zindagi	 āakhirat	 ke	 badle	 pasand	 karli	
aur	jeeti	duniya	(duniya	ki	zindagi)	ka	asbāb	āakhirat	ke	sāmne	nahi	magar	thoda.

arabicText: إِلَّا تَنفِرُوا۟ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا وَيَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ وَلَا تَضُرُّوهُ شَيْـًۭٔا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
If	you	do	not	migrate,	He	will	afflict	you	
with	 a	 painful	 punishment	 and	 bring	
other	people	in	your	stead	and	you	will	
not	be	able	to	harm	Him	in	the	least;	and	
Allah is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	na	kooch	karoge	to	tumheiñ sakht	saza	dega	aur	tumhāri	jagah	aur	log	le	āayega	aur	tum	
uska	kuchh	na	bigād	sakoge	aur	Allah	sab	kuchh	kar	sakta	hai.

arabicText: إِلَّا تَنصُرُوهُ فَقَدْ نَصَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِذْ أَخْرَجَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ثَانِىَ ٱثْنَيْنِ إِذْ هُمَا فِى ٱلْغَارِ إِذْ يَقُولُ لِصَـٰحِبِهِۦ لَا تَحْزَنْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَنَا ۖ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَيْهِ وَأَيَّدَهُۥ بِجُنُودٍۢ لَّمْ تَرَوْهَا وَجَعَلَ كَلِمَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلسُّفْلَىٰ ۗ وَكَلِمَةُ ٱللَّهِ هِىَ ٱلْعُلْيَا ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
If	you	do	not	help	him	(Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	Allah has	helped	
him	- when	he	had	to	go	forth	due	to	the	mischief	of	the	disbelievers,	just	as	two	men	*	- when	
they	were	in	the	cave,	when	he	was	saying	to	his	companion	“Do	not	grieve;	indeed	Allah is	with	
us”;	then	Allah caused	His	calm	to	descend	upon	him	and	helped	him	with	armies	you	did	not	
see,	and	disgraced	the	word	of	the	disbelievers;	and	Allah’s	Word	is	supreme;	and	Allah is	the	
Almighty,	 the	Wise.	(*	The	Holy	Prophet	migrated	only	with	S.	Abu	Bakr	(who	later	became	 the	
first	caliph)	as	his	sole	companion.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	 tum	Mehboob ki	madad	 na	 karo	 to	 be-shak Allah	 ne	 unki	madad	 farmayi	 jab	 kāfiroñ	 ki	
sharārat	se unheiñ	bāhar	tashreef	le	jāna	huwa	sirf	do	jān	se	jab	woh	donon	ghār	meiñ	they	jab	
apne	yār	se	 farmāte	 they	gham	na	kha	be-shak Allah	hamāre	sāth	hai	 to	Allah	ne	us	par	apna	
sakeena	(itminān)	utāra	aur	un	faujoñ	se	uski	madad	ki	jo	tum	ne	na	dekhiñ	aur	kāfiroñ	ki	bāt	
neeche	dāli	aur	Allah	hi	ka	bol	bāla	hai	aur	Allah	ghalib	Hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: ٱنفِرُوا۟ خِفَافًۭا وَثِقَالًۭا وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنفُسِكُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Migrate	 - whether	 willingly	 or	 with	 a	
heavy	 heart	 and	 fight	 in	 Allah's	 cause	
with	 your	wealth	and	 your	lives;	 this	is	
better	for	you,	if	you	realise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kooch	karo	halki	jān	se	chāheiñ bhāri	dil	
se	 aur	Allah	 ki	 rāh	meiñ	lado	 apne	māl	
aur	 jān	 se	 yeh	 tumhāre	 liye	 behtar	 hai	
agar	jāno.

arabicText: لَوْ كَانَ عَرَضًۭا قَرِيبًۭا وَسَفَرًۭا قَاصِدًۭا لَّٱتَّبَعُوكَ وَلَـٰكِنۢ بَعُدَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلشُّقَّةُ ۚ وَسَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَوِ ٱسْتَطَعْنَا لَخَرَجْنَا مَعَكُمْ يُهْلِكُونَ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Had	 there	 been	 some	 wealth	 near	 at	
hand	 or	 a	 short	 journey,	 they	 would	
have	certainly	accompanied	you,	but	the	
difficult	 path	 became	 very	 distant	 for	
them;	and	they	will	now	swear	by	Allah
that	“Had	we	been	able,	we	would	have	
surely	 accompanied	 you”;	 they	 destroy	
their	 own	 souls;	 and	 Allah knows	 that	
undoubtedly,	they	are	indeed	liars.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	 koi	 qareeb	 māl	 ya	 mutawassit	
safar	 hota	 to	 zaroor	 tumhāre	 sāth	 jāte	
magar	 un	 par	 to	 mashaqqat	 ka	 rāsta	
door	 pad	 gaya	 aur	 ab	 Allah	 ki	 qasam	
khayeñge	ke	hum	se	ban	padta	to	zaroor	
tumhāre	sāth	chalte	apni	jānoñ	ko	halāk	
karte	haiñ	aur	Allah	jānta	hai	ke	woh	beshak		zaroor	jhoote	haiñ.

arabicText: عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنكَ لِمَ أَذِنتَ لَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَتَعْلَمَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
May	 Allah forgive	 you	 *;	 why	 did	 you	
permit	 them	 **	 until	 the	 truthful	 ones	
had	 been	 manifested	 to	 you	 and	 the	
liars	 been	 exposed?	 (*	 This	 is	 an	
expression	 of	love	for	 the	Holy	 Prophet	-
peace	 and	 blessings	be	 upon	 him.	 **	The	
hypocrites	 had	 been	 permitted	 to	 stay	
back	from	the	holy	war.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	 tumheiñ	 	 mu'āf	 	 kare	 tum	 ne	
unheiñ	kyuñ	izn	 (ijāzat)	de	diya	jab	 tak	
na	khule	they	tum	par	sachche	aur	zāhir	
na	huwe	they	jhoote.

arabicText: لَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ أَن يُجَـٰهِدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	who	believe	in	Allah and	 the	
Last	 Day	 will	 not	 seek	 exemption	 from	
you	 for	 not	 fighting	 with	 their	 wealth	
and	their	lives;	and	Allah well	knows	the	
pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	 jo	 Allah	 aur	 qiyamat	 par	 Imān	
rakhte	haiñ	tum	se	chhutti	na	māñgeñge	
is	se	ke	apne	māl	aur	jān	se	Jihād	kareiñ		
aur	Allah	 khoob	jānta	 hai	 parhez-gāroñ
ko.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا يَسْتَـْٔذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَٱرْتَابَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فَهُمْ فِى رَيْبِهِمْ يَتَرَدَّدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Only	those	ask	 for	such	an	exemption	 from	you	who	do	not	believe	in	Allah and	the	Last	Day,	
and	whose	hearts	are	in	doubt	- so	they	waver	in	their	doubts.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	se	yeh	chhutti	wohi	māñgte	haiñ	jo	
Allah	aur	Qiyamat	par	 Imān	nahi	 rakhte	aur	unke	dil	 shak	meiñ	pade	haiñ	 to	woh	apne	 shak	
meiñ	dānwa-dol	haiñ.

arabicText: ۞ وَلَوْ أَرَادُوا۟ ٱلْخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّوا۟ لَهُۥ عُدَّةًۭ وَلَـٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمْ فَثَبَّطَهُمْ وَقِيلَ ٱقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَ ٱلْقَـٰعِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	going	forth	were	acceptable	to	them,	they	would	have	made	preparations	for	it,	but	Allah
Himself	disliked	their	getting	up	(to	fight)	so	He	filled	them	with	laze	and	it	was	said	“Continue	
sitting	with	those	who	remain	seated.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unheiñ	 nikalna	manzoor	 hota	 to	iska	 sāmān	 karte	magar	 khuda	 hi	 ko	 unka	 uthna	 na-pasand	
huwa	to	un	meiñ kāhili	bhar	di	aur	farmaya	gaya	ke	baith	raho	baith	rehne	wāloñ	ke	sāth.

arabicText: لَوْ خَرَجُوا۟ فِيكُم مَّا زَادُوكُمْ إِلَّا خَبَالًۭا وَلَأَوْضَعُوا۟ خِلَـٰلَكُمْ يَبْغُونَكُمُ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ وَفِيكُمْ سَمَّـٰعُونَ لَهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
If	 they	 had	 gone	 forth	 among	 you,	 you	 would	 then	 not	 gain	 any	 increase	 from	 them	 except	
trouble,	and	seeking	to	cause	turmoil	they	would	run	rumours	among	you;	and	their	spies	are	
among	you;	and	Allah well	knows	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	woh	 tum	meiñ	nikalte	 to	unse	siwa	nuqsān	ke	 tumheiñ		kuchh	na	badhta	aur	 tum	meiñ	
fitna	 dālne	 ko	 tumhāre	 beech	 meiñ	 gurābeiñ	 daudāte	 (fasād	 phailātey)	 aur	 tum	 meiñ	 unke	
jāsoos	maujood	haiñ	aur	Allah	khoob	jānta	hai	zālimoñ	ko

arabicText: لَقَدِ ٱبْتَغَوُا۟ ٱلْفِتْنَةَ مِن قَبْلُ وَقَلَّبُوا۟ لَكَ ٱلْأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَهُمْ كَـٰرِهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 they	 had	 sought	 to	 cause	 turmoil	
at	 the	 outset,	 and	 O	 dear	 Prophet	 the	
scheme	 turned	 otherwise	 *	 for	 you,	 so	
much	 so	 that	 the	 truth	 came	 and	 the	
command	 of	 Allah appeared,	 and	 they	
disliked	it.	(*	In	your	favour.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		unhoñ	ne	pehle	hi	fitna	chāha	tha	
aur	aey	Mehboob!	Tumhāre	liye	tadbeereñ	
ulti	 palteiñ	 yahāñ	 tak	 ke	 haq	 āaya	 aur	
Allah	ka	ḥukm zāhir	huwa	aur	unheiñ	nagawār	tha

arabicText: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَقُولُ ٱئْذَن لِّى وَلَا تَفْتِنِّىٓ ۚ أَلَا فِى ٱلْفِتْنَةِ سَقَطُوا۟ ۗ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةٌۢ بِٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. And	among	them	is	one	who	requests you	
that,	“Grant	me	exemption	(from	fighting)	
and	do	not	put	me	to	test”;	pay	heed!	They	
have	 indeed	 fallen	 into	 trial;	 and	 indeed	
hell	surrounds	the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	meiñ	koi	tum	se	yuñ	‘arz	karta	hai	
ke	mujhe	rukhsat	dijiye	aur	 fitne	meiñ	na	
dāliye	 sun	lo	 woh	 fitne	 hi	meiñ	 pade	 aur	
be-shak jahannam	ghere	huwe	hai	kāfiroñ	
ko.

arabicText: إِن تُصِبْكَ حَسَنَةٌۭ تَسُؤْهُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُصِبْكَ مُصِيبَةٌۭ يَقُولُوا۟ قَدْ أَخَذْنَآ أَمْرَنَا مِن قَبْلُ وَيَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُمْ فَرِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. If	 good	 befalls	 you	 they	 dislike	 it;	 and	
were	 some	 calamity	 to	 befall	 you,	 they	
would	say, “We	had	resolved	our	matters	
in	 advance”,	 and	 would	 turn	 away	
rejoicing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	tumheiñ		bhalāi	pahuñche	to	unheiñ	
bura	 lage	 aur	 agar	 tumheiñ	 	 koi	 musibat	
pahuñche	 to	 kaheñ	 hum	 ne	 apna	 kām	
pehle	 hi	 theek	 kar	 liya	 tha	 aur	 khushyāñ	
manāte	phir jāyeñ.

arabicText: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوْلَىٰنَا ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	O	 dear	 Prophet	 “Nothing	 shall	 befall	
us	except	what	Allah has	destined	 for	us;	
He	 is	 our	 Master;	 and	 the	 Muslims	 must	
rely	only	on	Allah.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo hameiñ	na	pahuñche	ga	magar	jo	Allah	ne	hamāre	liye	likh	diya	woh	hamāra	Maula	
hai	aur	Musalmanoñ		ko	Allah	hi	par	bharosa	chāhiye.

arabicText: قُلْ هَلْ تَرَبَّصُونَ بِنَآ إِلَّآ إِحْدَى ٱلْحُسْنَيَيْنِ ۖ وَنَحْنُ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمْ أَن يُصِيبَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابٍۢ مِّنْ عِندِهِۦٓ أَوْ بِأَيْدِينَا ۖ فَتَرَبَّصُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّتَرَبِّصُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	 “What	 do	 you	 wait	 for	 to	 happen to	
us,	 except	 one	 of	 the	 two	 good	 things?*	
And	 for	 you,	 we	 look	 forward	 to	 Allah
afflicting	 you	 with	 a	 punishment	 from	Himself	 or	 by	 our	 hands;	 so	 wait	- we	 too	 await	 with	
you.”	(*Death	in	Allah’s	way	or	victory.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo tum	hum	par	kis	cheez	ka	intezār	karte	ho	magar	do	khoobiyoñ	meiñ	se	ek	ka	aur	
hum	tum	par	is	intezār	meiñ	haiñ	ke	Allah	tum	par	‘aƶāb	dāle	apne	pās	se	ya	hamāre	hāthoñ	to	
ab	rāh	dekho	(intezār	karo)	hum	bhi	tumhāre	sāth	rāh	dekh	rahe	haiñ.

arabicText: قُلْ أَنفِقُوا۟ طَوْعًا أَوْ كَرْهًۭا لَّن يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُمْ ۖ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًۭا فَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Spend	willingly	or	with	a	heavy	heart,	it	will	never	be	accepted	from	you;	indeed	you	are	a	
disobedient	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Tum	farmāo		ke	dil	se	kharch	karo	ya	na-gawāri	se	tum	se	hargiz	qabool	na	hoga	be-shak		tum	
be-ḥukm	(na-farmān)		log	ho

arabicText: وَمَا مَنَعَهُمْ أَن تُقْبَلَ مِنْهُمْ نَفَقَـٰتُهُمْ إِلَّآ أَنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَبِرَسُولِهِۦ وَلَا يَأْتُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِلَّا وَهُمْ كُسَالَىٰ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَ إِلَّا وَهُمْ كَـٰرِهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 their	spending	was	not	stopped	being	accepted,	except	because	 they	disbelieved	in	Allah
and	His	Noble	Messenger,	and	 they	come	 to	prayer	with	heavy	hearts,	and	 they	do	not	spend	
except	unwillingly.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	kharch	karte	haiñ	uska	qabool	hona	band	na	huwa	magar	isi	liye	ke	woh	Allah-oRasool	se	munkir	huwe	aur	Namāz	ko	nahi	āatey magar	ji	hāre	(susti	ki	hālat	meiñ)	aur	kharch	
nahi	karte	magar	na-gawāri	se

arabicText: فَلَا تُعْجِبْكَ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَتَزْهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمْ وَهُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. So	 let	 not	 their	 riches	 or	 their	 children	
surprise	you;	Allah only	intends	to	punish	
them	 in	 the	 life	 of	 this	 world	 with	 these	
things	 and	 that	 they	 die	 only	 as	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 tumheiñ unke	 māl	 aur	 unki	 aulād	 ka	
t’ajjub	 na	 āaye	 Allah	 yahi	 chāhta	 hai	 ke	
duniya	 ki	 zindagi	 meiñ	 in	 cheezoñ	 se	 un	
par	wabāl	dāle	aur	 kufr	hi	par	unka	dam	
nikal	jāye.

arabicText: وَيَحْلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُمْ لَمِنكُمْ وَمَا هُم مِّنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ يَفْرَقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	(the	 hypocrites)	 swear	 by	Allah
that	 they	are	 from	among	 you	(Muslims);	
and	 they	 are	 not	 from	 among	 you	 -
however	those	people	are	afraid.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allah	 ki	 qasmeiñ	 khāte	 haiñ	 ke	 woh	
tum	 meiñ	 se	 haiñ	 aur	 tum	 meiñ	 se	 haiñ	
nahi	hāñ	woh	log	darte	haiñ.

arabicText: لَوْ يَجِدُونَ مَلْجَـًٔا أَوْ مَغَـٰرَٰتٍ أَوْ مُدَّخَلًۭا لَّوَلَّوْا۟ إِلَيْهِ وَهُمْ يَجْمَحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
If	 they	 find	 some	 refuge,	 or	 caves,	 or	 a	
place	 to	 hide,	 they	 will	 break	 the	 bonds	
and	return	there.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	 pāyeñ	 koi	 panah	 ya	 ghār	 ya	 samā	
jāne	 ki	 jagah	 to	 rassiyān	 tudāte	 (poori	
koshish kartey)	udhar	phir	jāyeñ	ge.

arabicText: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَلْمِزُكَ فِى ٱلصَّدَقَـٰتِ فَإِنْ أُعْطُوا۟ مِنْهَا رَضُوا۟ وَإِن لَّمْ يُعْطَوْا۟ مِنْهَآ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْخَطُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	among	them	is	one	who	slanders	you	
regarding	the	distribution	of	charity;	so	if	
they	 receive	 some	 of	 it	 they	 would	 be	
happy	 - and	 if	 not,	 thereupon	 they	 get	
displeased!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	meiñ	koi	woh	hai	ke	sadqe	bāñtne	
meiñ	 tum	 par	 t'an	 karta	 hai	 to	 agar	 un	
meiñ	se	kuchh	mile	to	rāzi	ho	jāyeñ	aur	na	
mile	to	jabhi	woh	narāz	haiñ.
